.. role:: php(code)
	:language: php


ThemeDirective
==============


.. php:namespace:: ILab\Stem\External\Blade\Directives

.. php:class:: ThemeDirective


	.. rst-class:: phpdoc-description
	
		| Class ThemeDirective\.
		
		| Adds an \`@theme\(\'name\-of\-theme\-seting\'\)\` directive to Blade templates that outputs the
		| value of a theme setting that has been configured via the customizer\.
		| 
		| Usage:
		| 
		| \`\`\`
		
	
	:Parent:
		:php:class:`ILab\\Stem\\Core\\ViewDirective`

-------

	.. php:method:: public execute( $args)
